strong.span:
The vision of the Attleboro Public Schools is to be the center of a community united around education,
where all stakeholders value and participate in our collective success.

div.style: border-width: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; left: 3px; top: 16px; width: 1px; height: 1px; overflow: hidden; position: absolute;

div.div: During our extended school closure, we have separated our Kindergarten registration into a two-step process. Step One is now available to you online, and the deadline is Friday, May 1, 2020.

div.a: Read More about Kindergarten Information Night

strong.em: The mission of the Attleboro Public Schools is to develop and deliver relevant learning experiences that engage, challenge, and inspire all students to maximize their unique potential and improve our world.
